forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 3 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As darkness envelops Downtown San Francisco, the evening reveals a mostly clear sky with a gentle breeze whispering through the streets. The temperature settles around a crisp 52 degrees, marking a tranquil autumn night, ideal for a quiet stroll through the illuminated city. The winds from the west, calm yet spirited, hint at a refreshing contrast to the warmth that will greet the morrow. The marine layer, a familiar visitor, lingers just at the edges of the bay, casting a soft veil over certain vistas, while the rest of the city basks under the soft glow of scattered stars and streetlights.

Tomorrow promises a delightful day to venture outdoors, with a sun-drenched sky and a high nearing 66 degrees. The forecast speaks of sunshine, perfect for leisurely pursuits—perhaps a visit to your favorite café, or a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, where the sound of the water mingles with the laughter of passersby. Given the gentle winds, dressing in layers would be wise; a light sweater or a denim jacket will offer just the right touch of warmth against the cool breeze. Take a moment tomorrow to relish the day, whether it be indulging in local art, discovering new flavors at a local market, or simply enjoying the beauty of an ordinary day in this extraordinary city.
